originalText.text: The building is not really protected, there is barey hot water and steam , all the time. Rat infested. Elevators and the intercome has not worked in years,they overcharge with rent and not give hardly any service the government should get rid of nycha.cause they are pocketing people's rent.not giving them service they deserve especially seniors they live in deplorable conditions things need to be fixed in the apt. This year my mom passed away she lived at 1980 Lexington ave. As it was not enough that she went through agonizing death and Mt. Sinai lost her personal belongings, I had to go through surrogate court to get access to apt 3. 1980 Lexington ave Ms. Lopez the office manager gave me access and said what ever I did not want to leave and if I notorized paper work and hand her the keys on time I get my mom's security back. To which now I am getting the run around  and she is not keeping the end of her word as am office manager . She gave me a number the agency told me me that they had nothing to do with it. This is nycha very shady and   I want ansewers but most importantly my mom's security antthey keep my mom's security which I need.these people in management need to be investigatedhernandez who ever he is is stating  I gave keys back late ,first I do not know who this person is. Is he corrupt like the rest of nycha? God don't like ugly and least of all these folks who lie to get gains that don't belong to them.
